---
title: Effects
description: Overview of shadow and blur effect tokens in Apsara.
---

import { Table } from "@raystack/apsara";

Effects add depth and visual hierarchy to your interface through shadows and blur. Apsara provides semantic effect tokens that work consistently across light and dark themes.

## Shadows

Shadow tokens create elevation and depth, helping users understand the layering of interface elements.

<Table>
  <Table.Header>
    <Table.Row>
      <Table.Head>Token</Table.Head>
      <Table.Head>Description</Table.Head>
      <Table.Head>Use Case</Table.Head>
    </Table.Row>
  </Table.Header>
  <Table.Body>
    <Table.Row>
      <Table.Cell><code>--rs-shadow-feather</code></Table.Cell>
      <Table.Cell>Subtle, minimal shadow</Table.Cell>
      <Table.Cell>Cards, subtle elevation</Table.Cell>
    </Table.Row>
    <Table.Row>
      <Table.Cell><code>--rs-shadow-soft</code></Table.Cell>
      <Table.Cell>Soft, gentle shadow</Table.Cell>
      <Table.Cell>Buttons, interactive elements</Table.Cell>
    </Table.Row>
    <Table.Row>
      <Table.Cell><code>--rs-shadow-lifted</code></Table.Cell>
      <Table.Cell>Noticeable elevation</Table.Cell>
      <Table.Cell>Dropdowns, popovers</Table.Cell>
    </Table.Row>
    <Table.Row>
      <Table.Cell><code>--rs-shadow-floating</code></Table.Cell>
      <Table.Cell>Strong floating effect</Table.Cell>
      <Table.Cell>Modals, dialogs, tooltips</Table.Cell>
    </Table.Row>
    <Table.Row>
      <Table.Cell><code>--rs-shadow-inset</code></Table.Cell>
      <Table.Cell>Inner shadow</Table.Cell>
      <Table.Cell>Pressed states, inputs</Table.Cell>
    </Table.Row>
  </Table.Body>
</Table>

## Blur Effects

Blur tokens are used for backdrop effects and creating depth through transparency.

  <Table.Header>
    <Table.Row>

      <Table.Head>Value</Table.Head>
      <Table.Head>Use Case</Table.Head>
    </Table.Row>
  </Table.Header>
  <Table.Body>
    <Table.Row>
      <Table.Cell><code>--rs-blur-sm</code></Table.Cell>
      <Table.Cell>blur(0.5px)</Table.Cell>
      <Table.Cell>Subtle blur effect</Table.Cell>
    </Table.Row>
    <Table.Row>
      <Table.Cell><code>--rs-blur-md</code></Table.Cell>
      <Table.Cell>blur(1px)</Table.Cell>
      <Table.Cell>Medium blur effect</Table.Cell>
    </Table.Row>
    <Table.Row>
      <Table.Cell><code>--rs-blur-lg</code></Table.Cell>
      <Table.Cell>blur(2px)</Table.Cell>
      <Table.Cell>Noticeable blur effect</Table.Cell>
    </Table.Row>
    <Table.Row>
      <Table.Cell><code>--rs-blur-xl</code></Table.Cell>

      <Table.Cell>Strong blur for overlays</Table.Cell>
    </Table.Row>
  </Table.Body>
</Table>

## Usage

### Shadows

```css
/* Card with subtle shadow */
.card {
  box-shadow: var(--rs-shadow-feather);
}

/* Card on hover with lifted effect */
.card:hover {
  box-shadow: var(--rs-shadow-lifted);
}

/* Dropdown menu */
.dropdown {
  box-shadow: var(--rs-shadow-lifted);
}

/* Modal dialog */
.modal {
  box-shadow: var(--rs-shadow-floating);
}

/* Pressed button state */
.button:active {
  box-shadow: var(--rs-shadow-inset);
}
```

### Blur Effects

```css
/* Frosted glass effect */
.glass {
  backdrop-filter: var(--rs-blur-lg);
  background-color: var(--rs-color-overlay-white-a4);
}

/* Subtle background blur */
.overlay {
  backdrop-filter: var(--rs-blur-xl);
}
```

Use shadows to establish visual hierarchy and indicate interactive states:

      <Table.Cell>Modals, dialogs, toasts</Table.Cell>

## Best Practices

- **Use shadows sparingly** - Too many shadows can make interfaces feel cluttered
- **Match elevation to importance** - Higher elevation shadows for more prominent elements
- **Consider theme context** - Shadows are automatically adjusted for dark theme
- **Combine with blur** - Use blur effects with overlays for a modern frosted glass aesthetic
- **Animate transitions** - Smooth shadow transitions on hover create polished interactions
